clearMessageWarning: 請注意，提交呢條訊息之後，所有後續訊息都將被刪除！
clearConversationWarning: 請注意，呢個操作會刪晒所有訊息！

morePrompts: 如果你想揾更多 prompt，撳呢度：

postOnShareGPT.title: po 上 ShareGPT
postOnShareGPT.warning: 請注意，你將呢個傾偈 po 上 ShareGPT 之後，佢會係公開嘅，所有人都可以見到你寫嘅嘢。一旦 po 咗，呢個傾偈將冇得被隱藏或刪除，亦都可能畀人存檔同分享。我哋建議你諗清楚，唔好喺嗰度分享敏感或私人資料。

migration.title: From Free to Better: The Evolution of ChatGPT
migration.description: We're excited to announce that Free ChatGPT has undergone an upgrade and is now Better ChatGPT!
migration.description2: ChatGPT can be used for FREE by accessing the Better ChatGPT website at <0>https://bettergpt.chat/</0>. Here are the steps: Go to the API settings and select "Use custom API endpoint." Then, input https://free.churchless.tech/v1/chat/completions as the endpoint and leave the API key field blank. After that, you can enjoy using ChatGPT without any cost or limitations!
migration.description3: Remember to join our discord group <0>https://discord.gg/g3Qnwy4V6A</0> for future updates!
